cmp: 出 (to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to occur/to happen/(a measure word for dramas, plays, or operas))

exm.mng: rock cave, grotto, cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
lit. nest of devils, place occupied by sinister forces
Mogao caves in Dunhuang 敦煌, Gansu
Longmen grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
Yungang caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西
lit. a crafty rabbit has three burrows, a sly individual has more than one plan to fall back on (idiom)
Dunhuang caves in Gansu, refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]
Mt Maiji caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
money squandering establishment (e.g. gambling den, brothel etc)

Four great caves, namely: Longmen grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 shan1 shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
